text:
Plethora | Full Stack, Computational Geometry, QA Automation | San Francisco, CA | https://www.plethora.com/

Plethora is a manufacturing startup in SF's Dogpatch neighborhood. We develop user-facing software that gives mechanical engineers feedback on their part designs, and factory software that automates the production process.

We offer 6 weeks paid vacation, paid parental leave, health benefits, catered lunch twice a week, and an in-house workshop/makerspace.
